A: A world where the ocean has dried up
Animated: An animated short film where the ocean dries up and the creatures that live there must adapt to survive
Alternative: An alternate reality where the ocean has dried up, and humanity must find a way to survive without it
Historical: A historical fiction novel where the ocean has dried up and the world must adapt to the new reality
Science Fiction: A science fiction novel where the ocean has dried up, and humanity must find a way to reintroduce water to the planet.
